Name: So.FeatureListSlider
AntiForgery: enabled
Author: Kees Schouten
Website: http://schouten-online.nl (not available yet)
Version: 1.0
OrchardVersion: 1.3
Description: A feature list slider alternative for the FeaturedItemSlider module. Compatible with v1.4.2 of FeaturedItemSlider module and maybe higher
Dependencies: FeaturedItemSlider
Category: Widget
